features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI for Talking Heads?
features.description: Our state-of-the-art technology enables seamless conversion from images to animated characters with emotional delivery.

items.title: Quick Turnaround
items.description: Receive your animated talking head within seconds, enabling rapid content creation.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: Simply upload an image and script; no technical expertise needed.

items.title: Secure Processing
items.description: All processing happens locally to ensure your content remains private and secure.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Easily create talking heads in three steps

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Select an image of a person that you want to animate. Our system supports various formats like JPG and PNG.

items.title: Provide Script
items.description: Input the dialogue or presentation script you want the character to express.

items.title: Generate Animation
items.description: Preview your talking head instantly, and download the animation for use in your projects.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Transform your content with talking heads that speak to your audience's needs.

items.name: Jessica Lee

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about creating AI talking heads

items.title: What type of images work best for animation?
items.description: Images with clear facial features and good lighting yield the best results for animation. A straight-on view of the face works ideally.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many talking heads I can create?
items.description: Users can generate multiple talking heads per session, with daily limits depending on their account type.

items.title: Can the AI handle various accents or languages?
items.description: Yes! The AI can generate speech in multiple languages and adjust for different accents, making it versatile for global audiences.

items.title: How secure is the uploaded content?
items.description: All uploads and processing are completed locally in your browser, ensuring that your images and scripts remain confidential and secure.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Engaging Content?
footer.description: Try our AI Talking Head feature now and see the difference in your presentations. No registration needed.
